sourcesContent:
<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "Charts",
  data() {
    return {
      countries: [],
      data: [],
    };
  },
  created() {
    // Get the countries from the url
    this.countries = this.$route.query.countries.split(",");
    // console.log(this.countries);

    // Fetch the data for each country
    this.countries.forEach((country) => {
      axios
        .get(`https://api.example.com/data/${country}`)
        .then((response) => {
          // Save the data for the country
          this.data.push({
            country,
            data: response.data,
          });
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.error(error);
        });
    });
    console.log(this.countries);
  },
};
</script>
